name: Endless cubes
description:
This endless runner is a result of a school assignment. It contains very little, but the requirements for the game are there. The requirements for this game are: 

  • The character is running away from the viewer in a constant speed. 
  • There are obstacles on the road that must be avoided.  
  • There must be animated pickups.
  • The input for the game must be “left” to change one lane to the left, “right” to change one lane to the right and “up” to jump.
  • The game should have sound effects and background music.

Extra things this game has:

  • An AI that will play the game for you, after playing once!

This page is made to just show the game. Share the game for others to have fun.
